typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		transaction_id as string,
		cust_id as integer,
		tran_date as string,
		prod_subcat_code as integer,
		prod_cat_code as integer,
		Qty as integer,
		Rate as integer,
		Tax as double,
		total_amt as double,
		Store_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 10) ~> sourcetransaction
source(output(
		lkp_transaction_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select transaction_id as lkp_transaction_id from Transactions',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> lkptrans
source(output(
		lkp_d_key as integer,
		lkp_customer_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select D_KEY as lkp_d_key,customer_Id as lkp_customer_id from D_customer',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> lkp_customer
insertEXIST keyGenerate(output(out_sutgate_key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey
Lookupcustomer derive(tran_date = toTimestamp(tran_date,'dd-MM-yyyy')) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn, lkptrans exists(transaction_id == lkp_transaction_id,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> insertEXIST
DerivedColumn, lkptrans exists(transaction_id == lkp_transaction_id,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> update
update alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> updaterow
sourcetransaction, lkp_customer lookup(cust_id == lkp_customer_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookupcustomer
SurrogateKey sink(input(
		Transaction_key as integer,
		customer_Key as integer,
		customer_id as integer,
		transaction_id as string,
		tran_date as date,
		prod_subcat_code as integer,
		prod_cat_code as integer,
		Qty as integer,
		Rate as integer,
		Tax as decimal(12,2),
		total_amt as decimal(12,2),
		Store_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		customer_id = cust_id,
		customer_Key = lkp_d_key,
		Transaction_key = out_sutgate_key,
		transaction_id,
		prod_subcat_code,
		prod_cat_code,
		Qty,
		Rate,
		Tax,
		total_amt,
		Store_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> inserttrans
updaterow sink(input(
		Transaction_key as integer,
		customer_Key as integer,
		customer_id as integer,
		transaction_id as string,
		tran_date as date,
		prod_subcat_code as integer,
		prod_cat_code as integer,
		Qty as integer,
		Rate as integer,
		Tax as decimal(12,2),
		total_amt as decimal(12,2),
		Store_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['transaction_id'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		transaction_id,
		customer_Key = lkp_d_key,
		tran_date,
		prod_subcat_code,
		prod_cat_code,
		Qty,
		Rate,
		Tax,
		total_amt,
		Store_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> updattrans
